_meta.source: Researched from Icy Strait Point, Huna Totem Corp, and cruise resources

bbox_hint.note: Covers Icy Strait Point complex and Point Adolphus whale watching area

transit_routes.name: Gondola to Mountaintop
transit_routes.note: Scenic gondola to ZipRider start and mountaintop views. Can ride down or zip.

transit_routes.name: Point Adolphus Whale Watch
transit_routes.note: Boat to premier humpback feeding grounds. High success rate for sightings.

featured_experiences.name: ZipRider Adventure
featured_experiences.note: Book early - sells out. Gondola ride up, zip ride down. Incredible experience.

featured_experiences.name: Whale Watching
featured_experiences.note: One of Alaska's best whale watching areas. Summer months excellent.

featured_experiences.name: Tlingit Cultural Experience
featured_experiences.note: Icy Strait Point is wholly owned by Huna Tlingit people. Authentic cultural immersion.
